title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.1 - Basic course requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.1 - Basic course requirements

State Regulations

Individuals desiring to satisfy the education requirements
to become licensed security or fire alarm system installers must satisfactorily
complete five courses prescribed by section
196.8
of this Part identified as: Module 1, Module 2, Module 3, Module 4 and Module 5. Module 1, Module 2, Module
3 and Module 4 will consist of a program of 15 classroom hours. Module 5 will
consist of a program of 21 classroom hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
196.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
